law.history: Repealed 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 256, sec. 8, effective July 13, 1984; amended ch. 414, sec. 28. -- Created 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 107, sec. 11.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Regulations for issuance of employment and age certificates -- Furnishing of blank forms -- Duplicates.
metadata.lrc-note: . This section was amended by 1984 Acts Ch. 414, Â§ 28 and repealed by 1984 Acts Ch. 256, Â§ 8. Pursuant to KRS 446.260, the repeal prevails.
